It's been a long day for Naruto Uzumaki and Squad 7... he just got back from a mission in the sand village where he spent a full day getting his butt kicked by Temari's perverted, rouge sister that his squad was assigned to capture! When they went out into the desert to look for her she immediately kidnapped him when he got separated from the squad to pee; she knocked him out, tied him up, hung him from a desert tree naked, and spanked his ass until he told her what their plan of action was. Luckily Kakashi sensei was there or Sakura and Sasuke would have been captured by her too... and who knows what her dirty mind had in store for them!!

Now a humiliated, annoyed Naruto walks through an alleyway in the Nara area of the Leaf Village, trying to think of the best spots to graffiti. He has only been this area once before (also for graffiti) and found himself a little lost. With every step he takes, his feet peel away from his sweat soaked sandals and fall back down with a SQUELCH... SQUELCH... SQUELCH... *stop* What... ? He- he can't move his legs! Or his arms... OR HIS HEAD!! "What the hell is going on??!", he thinks.

Suddenly Naruto is able to move his upper-body... but not his legs. Stuck in place by an unknown force, Naruto swungs his arms furiously in an attempt to uproot his legs, but to no avail. Looking around at the abandoned houses of the Nara people, there was no one he could call for help!! He starts to panic. Close to tears, the ninja flunky's head darts left and right looking for a way to get himself free. Just as he is about to give up and lets out a whimper of defeat... he hears a giggle coming from behind him!!

He turns his head to see a beautiful, middle aged Nara woman in a pink blouse and dark-coloured skirt with an apron over it. With a laugh she brushes her long brown hair away from her face and smiles evilly at her prisoner and says, "Shut up and walk, brat." Nooooooo... twice in one day?? And, again, his entire body was under her control. His heart pounding against his ribcage, sweating out of every pore in his body, he wonders what his captor has in store for him. Right on cue she says, "Don't worry, hun, I'm not gonna hurt you... much."

When they finally reached the mystery womans house, which Naruto thought looked familiar, they stop and she says, "You probably don't remember, but you did a number on my house the last time you were here... I didn't think you'd have the balls to come right into the palm of my hand after what you wrote, Naruto... something about the women of the Nara clan being ugly old hags? *giggle*" With that she brings out a pan and knocks him over the head with it.

Dragging an unconscious Naruto behind her, she locks the door behind her knowing that her family won't be home until Midnight... what to do with all that time she wonders with a devious chuckle...

112331.content:
Kurenai was strolling down the village of Konoha, heading towards home after a long mission with Team 8. She felt very proud of her team, their teamwork was impeccable and the mission was a complete success. While she was deep in her thoughts, the kunoichi did not notice the shadow lurking behind her.

Snapping out of her thoughts, she saw Asuma waiting in front of her household. The black haired woman always enjoyed his company, and they have been secretly dating throughout the years. It took a bit of time, but Kurenai eventually accepted to date with him. Although, she hated that fact that he smoked quite often in front of her. It would take some getting used to.

"Heya babe," Asuma greeted.

"Asuma, what are you doing here?" Kurenai asked.

"Am I not allowed to visit my girlfriend?" Asuma questioned with a smile.

"I suppose you can, but I was hoping to spend some time alone to rest after that long mission," she responded with a sigh.

"Well, I do have some ways to make you relax with my company.." he said with an evil grin.

Kurenai noticed the smirk, but thought nothing of it until she was knocked out from the back with a chop to the neck.

A couple of hours later, the kunoichi woke up dazzled and looked at her surroundings. She was in some kind of underground dungeon which was unfamiliar. There was not much lighting except a small lamp settled above her. She tried to move but found out that she couldn't because she was wrapped around with some kind of restraining paper. Her feet were free from the straps, but she could not move them much. There was a hole where her abdomen was, which she noticed was uncovered. The papers around her stomach were cut from the bottom of her breasts to the top of her panties, leaving her midriff completely exposed at will. She did not mind, however, since the temperature was pretty high and she could feel her body sweating.

A dark figure approached the distressed ninja. He had a black robe covering him, with red clouds. His face was not hidden, however, and Kurenai already knew who she would be dealing with; Itachi Uchiha.

"What are you doing here you traitor?" Kurenai growled in anger.

"Give me the whereabouts of the Kyuubi Jinchuriki," he demanded.

"Why do you want Naruto?"

"That's for me to know and you to find out," he replied in a cold tone.

"No way, I will not give out the location of an ally. Go to hell," she yelled.

"Very well, it did not have to go this way but I have no other choice," he stated with a sigh.

Kurenai tensed as he approached the table and got a good look at his face. She gasped as she saw his Sharingan, gazing up at her body. Itachi put a hand on her smooth concave stomach, and rubbed it gently. She felt his cold hands touching her belly and she moaned.

"This is your last chance, tell me where he is hiding," he ordered.

"Never on my life!" was her only response.

With no choice, he began to break through the woman by...

When Kabuto woke up, he was in a large room and was lying on a table, his hands tied up above his head. His legs were tied up too. He didn’t know who did that to him. He thought, it was a bad joke. He sighed, and tried to get his hands free. But he didn’t succeed. Then he heard footsteps.
‘Is anybody there?’ he asked.
‘Yes’ the answer came from a dark corner.
‘Who is it?’
‘Don’t you recognize my voice, Kabuto?’
The silver haired boy suddenly recognized it. It was Kidomaru.
‘Why did you do this?’
‘We want to get revenge on you.’
‘Why? And who else?’ asked Kabuto a little confused.
‘Cause you always lecture us. We had enough. Me and the Sound Ninja 5.’ said Kidomaru’s voice.
‘Then, come on, do whatever you want. Come out of the darkness.’ said Kabuto with a sigh.
And Kidomaru came out.
‘What will you do now?’ asked Kabuto on an ‘I am so bored’ voice. ‘And where are the others?’ he added.
‘Don’t worry they left the job to me. By the way, I found out your weak point.’ said Kidomaru with an evil smile.
Kabuto looked curious.
‘And what is it?’ he asked.
‘We know you are ticklish.’
Kabuto was very surprised. Then, he knew what would happen next. And he didn’t want it to happen. He was nervous, but he didn’t show it.
‘And what do you want to do now?’ he asked calmly.
‘Oh, don’t say you haven’t found it out yet. I will tickle you, and won’t stop until you promise that you won’t lecture us anymore.’ said Kidomaru in an evilly calm voice.
Kabuto sighed. He was a bit nervous.
‘You don’t dare to do It.’ he said.
‘No?’ asked Kidomaru ‘I think I can prove you, that I dare. Now, tell me, where are your most ticklish spot.’
‘I won’t tell you’ said Kabuto.
He was extremely ticklish and he didn’t want anyone to know about where the most. Actually, he was ticklish at his feet, thighs, stomach, ribs, and armpits a bit. But especially stomach and ribs. And thighs too.
‘OK, then. Where shall I start?’
